EmailTemplate.subject: Win a TurboStack Cloud Lab! Drawing August 1st
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://vmturbo.com/turbostack-giveaway?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=turbostack&utm_content=03182016]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Sometimes when it comes time to elevating IT, we first have to elevate ourselves. During this month's TurboStack giveaway that is exactly what we're helping you to do, not only can you win a really cool home lab, but youâ€™ll get to extend your lab all the way to the public cloud. The TurboStack Cloud Lab is an expertly crafted hardware and software bundle packaged with AWS components that allows you to prepare for the challenge of cloud adoption. Click below, watch the video, answer the question and be entered to win! <[[http://vmturbo.com/turbostack-giveaway?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=turbostack&utm_content=04082016]]> Enter for a chance to win! VMTurboStack Homelab Valued over USD $1300. What's in the VMTurboStack Home Lab?
- (1) Intel NUC NUC6i5SYK
- (1) 32 GB of DDR4 RAM
- (1) 128 GB os mStata SSD Storage
- (1) $250 USD of Amazon Web Services Credits
- (1) $120 USD towards your AWS Solutions Architect Associate certification, or towards more AWS credits
- (1) VMTurbo License with Hybrid Cloud Control for managing up to 50 EC2 Instances
- (1) Access to recipes for building Cloud, PaaS, Container, and other virtualized infrastructure in your lab
-The VMTurbo Team
